content.question: If the magnitude of the electric field due to the sphere at point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="E sub p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, what is the magnitude of the field at point <math alttext="Uppercase R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>R</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>, and why?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 9 E sub p, over 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the electric field is inversely proportional to the square of the distance from the charge.

<math alttext="the fraction 9 E sub p, over 25" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the electric field is inversely proportional to the square of the distance from the charge.

<math alttext="E sub p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the electric field is proportional to the magnitude of the charge.

<math alttext="the fraction 10 E sub p, over 3 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the electric field is proportional to the distance from the charge.

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 9 E sub p, over 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, because the electric field is inversely proportional to the square of the distance from the charge.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
